page.title: 10CAREY BAPTIST CHURCH (cont)
page.content: On October 2nd, 1792 the Baptist Missionary Society was founded at Kettering, and Carey voulenteered to go to India. The first few months were full of difficulties. At last he met an English Cristian in the village. Now self supporting he was able to preach in the villages. On March 5th, 1801 Carey laid on the Communion Table the very first copy of the Bengali Bible. Now in Carey Baptist Church there is a museum in memory of Carey. Many people go to the church, the Minister is Stuart Jenkins. He comes to the school sometimes. The Baptist community in Moulton dates from the middle opf the 17th century. A John Clown moved in 1652 and began to hold meetings in a cottage. Todays building is in West Street.
